Exploring Yarns 
=====

Inputs {.sidebar}
-------------------------

```{r}
inputPanel(
  selectInput("eda_var", label = "Select a Variable to Explore",
              choices = c("Yardage" = "yardage", 
                          "Rating Average" = "rating_average",
                          "Rating Counts" = "rating_count"))
)
```

Column
--------
```{r, warning= FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
renderPlot({
  yarn |>
    ggplot(aes(x = .data[[input$eda_var]])) +
    geom_boxplot()
})
```
